summary: Adds Achilles Armor to Skyrim. Completely stand alone.
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8VKru8s.png[/IMG][/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HBnmp8D.png[/IMG][/CENTER]
This mod adds Achilles Stand Alone  armor (from the movie Troy) to Skyrim.
By now, the mod contains Achilles Cuirass, Achilles Boots and Achilles Bracers. And, by now, it
is only a MALE armor set. 

Base Armor Stats - 

The Cuirass ( light ) - 40
The Boots ( light ) - 12
The Bracers ( light ) - 12

About its weight -

Cuirass - 8
Boots - 3
Bracers - 3

Where is it ? Is it craftable?

- You will find the armor at Bleak Falls Barrow - Sanctum ( pics related ) 
- It is not craftable.

[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/V8kh0fw.png[/IMG][/CENTER]
There are no Requirements as this is completely stand alone.

[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NdPCwZ2.png[/IMG][/CENTER]
There are no issues found. No replacements. Totally compatible with any other mod.

[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/j2nKgf4.png[/IMG][/CENTER]
-To install, just use NMM. 
If you do it manually, extract content to data folder ! 

-To unninstall: Use NMM.
Otherwise, remove all the files manually.

[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/j7OojAj.png[/IMG][/CENTER]

- Bethesda for making the best game ever.
- Nexus Site for having such a strong build community.
- Nightasy for his \\\"Creating Custom Armors Step by Step\\\" guide. 

[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GwSKKof.png[/IMG][/CENTER]
- Achilles Helmet
- Achilles Shield
- Female armor set


[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/F5SMP9Z.png[/IMG][/CENTER]

author: FurrySwords
